text: 3:5: Mul 32:32-33; Chng 69:28; Dng 20:12; Mth 10:32; Lug 12:8 Hanyie è yang pha ji shii mua pho ne imo ji duiine guii ruii phro, chiih-è gu ne ithek ro ibengthek ne sieng pha jigi re-è asad phro. Guro Aphuii nane airo hamangkhliiethek moe shii gu ne ithek shii guro chak rone hong ne yaothiak pha ro.
